name: Consecrated Scorpion
desc:
Remnant Venom: Consecrated Scorpion

A poisonous scorpion that became twisted and warped by eating some great being. It now commands perilous lightning.

customize.name: Consecrated Scorpion
customize.desc:
Remnant Venom: Consecrated Scorpion

A poisonous scorpion that became twisted and warped by eating some great being. It now commands perilous lightning.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Consecrated Scorpion's Ambush

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow!" "We cats find it hard to make friends with... spiky fellows, never mind these big, fierce scorpions!"
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Meow!" "We cats find it hard to make friends with... spiky fellows, never mind these big, fierce scorpions!"</color>
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: This opponent engages in a Duel with you rather than an Adventure Challenge. The Consecrated Scorpion starts with the Talent Card "Fatal Fulmination" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Fatal Fulmination
customize.desc:
Consecrated Scorpion: Fatal Fulmination

Lifeforms are governed by the laws of evolution, Consecrated Beasts exploited these rules by being fortunate enough to discover a long-dead carcass of a greater being before any of their competition ever did.

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Consecrated Scorpion's Mortal Battle

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "Word has it that there are big purple scorpions in the desert that chase cats from far, far away, and they never let up! As such, all desert cats have learned some tricks to avoid their gaze."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: This opponent engages in a Duel with you rather than an Adventure Challenge. The Consecrated Scorpion starts with the Talent Card "Fatal Fulmination" equipped, while the Consecrated Flying Serpent starts with the Talent Card "Deathly Cyclone" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Consecrated Scorpion

A poisonous scorpion that became twisted and warped by eating some great being. It now commands perilous lightning.

customize.name: Consecrated Flying Serpent
customize.desc:
Remnant Squall: Consecrated Flying Serpent

A flying serpent that became twisted and warped by eating some great being. Now, it commands the fearsome winds.

Reach Player Level 8
Complete 3 challenge objective(s) in Consecrated Scorpion's Ambush

However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

value.name: Fatal Fulmination
value.desc:
Consecrated Scorpion: Fatal Fulmination

Lifeforms are governed by the laws of evolution, Consecrated Beasts exploited these rules by being fortunate enough to discover a long-dead carcass of a greater being before any of their competition ever did.

value.text: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Consecrated Scorpion

value.name: Consecrated Scorpion
value.desc:
An arthropod that has mutated after feeding from greater lifeforms.

Lifeforms are governed by the laws of evolution, Consecrated Beasts exploited these rules by being fortunate enough to discover a long-dead carcass of a greater being before any of their competition ever did. Animals and humans often have far more in common than the latter is willing to acknowledge.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 3 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> .
Create 1 <color=#ffffff>Bonecruncher's Energy Block</color> card and randomly place it within the top 2 cards of your deck.

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 3 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> . <color=#ffffff>Discard</color> up to 3 <color=#ffffff>Bonecruncher's Energy Block</color> cards from your Hand, and create 1 <color=#ffffff>Thunderbore Trap</color> on the opposing side of the field.
<color=#ece5d8>Thunderbore Trap</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After a character on this side of the field uses a Skill:</color> Deals 2 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> to their team's active character.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> : Initial amount equal to the number of <color=#ffffff>Bonecruncher's Energy Block</color> discarded when created. (Max 3 stacks)

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
(Passive) When the Round ends, create 2 <color=#ffffff>Bonecruncher's Energy Block</color> cards and randomly place them within the top 10 cards of your deck.

<color=#ffd780>Event Card</color>
Randomly <color=#ffffff>Discard</color> 1 card from your Hand with the highest original Cost and create 1 Elemental Die of your active character's Element. (Only 1 such card can be played per Round)

Applies Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Discard</color>
Use Action Cards or Character Skill effects to Discard Action Cards from Hand or Deck.
<color=#ece5d8>Energy</color>
Characters must consume Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.
When characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 Energy.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
